commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So last week, we decided to make a promo video to spread the message about the School Idol Festival slogan. What song are we going to use for it?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Since we're going out of our way to make a promo video, why don't we write a new song for it too?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Yes, it would be great to have a song that is symbolic of the event itself.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: But who will write it?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Well the songwriter would either be Riko, me...or you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You're right. Do either of you have any ideas?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Hmm... Nothing's really coming to me just yet.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Maki can't get into the swing of things unless Kayo-chin and I are nearby cheering for her. Isn't that right, Kayo-chin?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Should we all meet up in the music room during lunch again?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: *Chuckle* Having everyone around to help write a song sounds like it would be a lot of fun.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: They don't exactly ask permission...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Aw, you're blushing up to your hair, Maki!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I'm not blushing!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Come on, guys. We're supposed to be discussing our new song.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: So, what should we do?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What do you think, Riko?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Um, actually... I've had an idea for a new song ever since we came up with our slogan.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: What?! This is the first I'm hearing of it! You should've said something sooner, Riko!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Sorry. I just wanted to see if our other songwriters had any ideas first.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I don't think Maki or I have any solid ideas just yet. What did you have in mind?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Well, um... To put it simply, I want it to be kind of an inspirational song.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh, tell us more!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I don't know if I can really put it in words... But, uh...

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Chasing your dreams isn't always just fun and games. Sometimes it hurts so much that you just want to give up. Sometimes, you want to just run away from it all.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I think everyone worries deep down that it's impossible to make their dreams come true.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: But as long as you have someone working alongside you, you'll find the strength to keep trying.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: So we should all talk about our dreams! Especially when you're at your lowest! It's hard when you're alone, but not when we're all in it together!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I want to write something inspirational like that. A song that cheers people on when they feel like nothing is going right.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: That's great. Here I thought you weren't saying anything because you had no ideas either, but I couldn't have been more wrong. I say Riko should write the song. How about you all?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I totally agree!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Oh, Riko! I had no idea you were thinking so deeply about this! It's perfect! I wanna sing it with everyone in Aqours!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm sure it'll be amazing. I can't wait to see you all sing it!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Then that settles it! The song for the promo video will be Aqours' new song! The song has such a beautiful message, I can't wait to hear what it'll sound like!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: That's a lot of pressure, but... I want to do what I can to meet those expectations of yours.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Wow! You sound so confident today, Riko!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I'm not trying to rush you or anything, but we do have a schedule to stick to. How long do you think it'll take you to write the song?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I have the basics down already, so I don't think it will take much time at all.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: But I do need everyone's help filling in some of the parts that need more fleshing out.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: What do you need? I'll help you out in any way I can. Rina-chan Board says, "Serious!"

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Well, I'd like you all to tell me about some of your failures or times you've been really down and how you picked yourself back up afterward.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Oh, then you can come right to me! I'm not proud of it, but I've handled more screw-ups than I can count!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Why do you sound so happy about that, Honoka...?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Haha... Though she's right that we have an awfully big library to draw from.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: The best thing to do when you're feeling down is to get your body moving! Just clear your mind and start working up a sweat. You'll feel refreshed in body and mind!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Chuckle* It'd be nice if that worked for everyone. What works for me is talking things through with other people.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I've listened to a bunch of stories about Yoshiko's failures and misfortunes before. Hey Yoshiko, did that make you feel any better, zura?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Hey! Why are you bringing that up in front of everyone?! And it's Yohane!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Giggle* You two sure are close. There was one time I felt just hopeless because I couldn't do this thing no matter how hard I tried practicing. So...

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I made you some flaky, fluffy cream puffs, right? Talking things over with a friend while eating nice, sweet treats can cure pretty much any ills you might have.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Ugh, none of you have any idea how it's done! It has to be more dramatic! Let me tell you the story of Nico Yazawa, the galaxy's number one school idol, and her deep, dark past...

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Emma! If you're ever feeling down, you can always drop by and have some of my family's sweets! We'll treat you to a feast!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hey, I was talking!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Oh wait, are you okay with Japanese sweets?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: More than okay! I love them!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hello? I said I was talking!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Thanks, guys. I think I have enough material to fill in the blanks now.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Argh... I got so carried away I laid my whole life bare for everyone in the world to see...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Me too... I'm so embarrassed.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Goodness me, I had no idea your past held such riveting stories, Eli-chi!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I'm begging you... Please just forget what I said!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I've got a pretty good idea of what I wanna do, so I should be able to have it done by our next regular meeting at this rate.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Wow! I can't wait!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Given the time, I believe this would be a good place to finish up.
